scripts.build:ace: cd ../accessibility-checker-engine && npm install && npm run build && npm run build-debug && npm run build-node && cd ../rule-server
scripts.build:ace:debug: cd ../accessibility-checker-engine && npm install && npm run build-debug && npm run build-node && cd ../rule-server
scripts.build:help: shx rm -rf ./src-gatsby/src/pages/tools && shx mkdir ./src-gatsby/src/pages/tools && shx cp -r ../accessibility-checker-engine/help ./src-gatsby/src/pages/tools/help && cd src-gatsby && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && npm run build:ace && npm run build:help && shx mkdir -p src/routes && shx mkdir -p api && shx mkdir -p api/dist && tsoa routes && tsoa swagger && tsc -p ./src && gulp --gulpfile gulp/gulpfile.js build
scripts.build:nohelp: shx rm -rf dist && npm run build:ace && shx mkdir -p src/routes && shx mkdir -p api && shx mkdir -p api/dist && tsoa routes && tsoa swagger && tsc -p ./src && gulp --gulpfile gulp/gulpfile.js build
scripts.start: npm run build && cd dist && node main.js
scripts.start:nohelp: npm run build:nohelp && cd dist && node main.js
scripts.debug: npm run build && TS_NODE_PROJECT=./src/tsconfig.json node --nolazy --inspect-brk=9229 -r ts-node/register ./src/main.ts
